title: 有关1.8.1发布以及bug修复进程
author: cyqsimon
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2014-10-15 21:34 编辑 



Dinnerbone: I fixed the oldest open issue earlier... hopefully. https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-3  "Player facing changes when passing through nether portals".
Dinnerbone: 我刚刚修复了最老的未修复bug...希望是这样吧... https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-3 “玩家在穿过地狱门后会改变朝向”

Dinnerbone: Here's some gifs of what it looks like: https://gfycat.com/NippyLiquidImp … https://gfycat.com/FamousUnsteady … https://gfycat.com/DeafeningCaver …
Dinnerbone: 差不多就是这些动图里的样子吧: https://gfycat.com/NippyLiquidImp … https://gfycat.com/FamousUnsteady … https://gfycat.com/DeafeningCaver …
* 动图加载稍慢，请耐心等候




Searge: Don't forget to vote on the most annoying bugs in our bugtracker, I usually sort bugs by votes. A lot of bugs are fixed for 1.8.1 already.
Searge: 别忘了去参加“bug跟踪器上最烦人的bug”投票，因为我通常都是按照投票决定bug的重要性的。很多bug都已经在1.8.1里修复了。
Searge: I'm not sure if I'll be able to hide a secret feature in the upcoming 1.8.1 pre-release, but if I do, I won't tell anyone about it this time
Searge: 我不知道这次我还能不能在1.8.1 pre里藏一个秘密特性，但是如果我真的想藏的话，这次我是不会告诉任何人的哦




Jeb: Achievements bring out the puns of every game developer
Jeb: 成就总是会让开发者不自觉地用上双关语
* 机智的jeb，开发者是指自己吗？难道jeb在暗示1.8.1会有新的成就？




Searge: When Dinnerbone fixed issue MC-3, I wanted to know what the new oldest open issue was. It was MC-4. Well, not anymore. So which one's next?
Searge: 当Dinnerbone修复了MC-3的时候，我就在想，新的最老未修复bug是哪个呢？好吧，是MC-4。额，MC-4也不再是了。下一个呢？


可见1.8.1作为一个bug修复版本，改变还真不少，不仅修复大量bug，说不定还包含一两个新特性呢，各位尽请期待。
